rules_text:
[i](As a Conquest enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it's defeated, put it onto the battlefield transformed.)[/i]
When Battle for the Apex enters the battlefield, up to two target creatures can't block this turn. Until your next turn, those creatures attack each combat if able.
rules_text2:
{T}: Add {R}.
{1}{R}, {T}: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile that creature at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only as a sorcery.
